name: Trello Label Stripes
description: Apply diagonal stripes to three of the six card label colors (Green, Orange, and Purple). This helps red-green colorblind people distinguish the labels.
additional_info: This uses CSS3 repeating linear gradients. I have only tested it on Google Chrome on OS X.
css:
@-moz-document domain("trello.com") {
.card-label.green-label {
    background-image:-webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:-moz-repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:-ms-repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:-o-repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
}

.card-label.orange-label {
    background-image:-webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:-moz-repeating-linear-gradient(45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:-ms-repeating-linear-gradient(45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:-o-repeating-linear-gradient(45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:repeating-linear-gradient(45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
}

.card-label.purple-label {
    background-image:-webkit-repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:-moz-repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:-ms-repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:-o-repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
    background-image:repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg,
        transparent,
        transparent 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 5px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 10px,
        transparent 10px,
        transparent 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 15px,
        rgba(255, 255, 255, .5) 20px
    ) !important;
}

}
